checks.title: Lobby and reception area spotless
checks.description: Verify front desk, seating, and lobby floors are clean and welcoming
checks.pass_criteria: Clean floors, dusted surfaces, organized desk area
checks.fail_criteria: Visible dirt, cluttered desk, or dusty furniture

checks.title: Guest room ready for check-in
checks.description: Check that guest room is fully cleaned with fresh linens
checks.pass_criteria: Bed made with fresh linens, surfaces cleaned, no trash
checks.fail_criteria: Unmade bed, dirty surfaces, or trash present
checks.image_prompt: Photo of guest room showing bed and overall cleanliness

checks.title: Bathroom sparkling and stocked
checks.description: Verify guest bathroom is thoroughly cleaned with amenities stocked
checks.pass_criteria: Spotless fixtures, fresh towels, full amenities
checks.fail_criteria: Dirty bathroom, used towels, or missing supplies

checks.title: Common area furniture clean and arranged
checks.description: Check that seating areas, tables, and common spaces are tidy
checks.pass_criteria: Clean furniture, organized layout, vacuumed floors
checks.fail_criteria: Stained furniture, disorganized, or dirty floors
checks.image_prompt: Photo of common area or guest lounge

checks.title: Elevators and hallways clean
checks.description: Verify corridors, elevators, and stairwells are clean and well-lit
checks.pass_criteria: Clean floors, walls, and elevator interior, good lighting
checks.fail_criteria: Dirty floors, stained walls, or poor lighting
checks.image_prompt: Photo of hallway or elevator interior

checks.title: Pool or fitness area maintained
checks.description: Check that recreational areas are clean and equipment is organized
checks.pass_criteria: Clean floors, organized equipment, fresh towels available
checks.fail_criteria: Dirty areas, scattered equipment, or no towels
checks.image_prompt: Photo of pool deck or fitness center
